<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_1008</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_1008</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Áreas de figuras planas</string>
            <string language="en">Areas of planes figures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereiche der Flächeabbildungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Zones des chiffres d'avions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Áreas de figuras dos planos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Zone delle figure degli aerei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τομείς των αριθμών αεροπλάνων</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el procedimiento para calcular áreas de figuras planas. Se estudian las medidas de superficie y la deducción y utilización de la fórmula para el cálculo del área de rectángulo, paralelogramo, triángulo, rombo, trapecio, polígonos regulares y círculo.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to calculate the surface area of plane figures. It studies the units of areas and deduces and uses the formulae for calculating the areas of rectangles, parallelograms, triangle, rhombus, trapezium, regular polygons and circle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">área</string>
            <string language="en">area</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">círculo</string>
            <string language="en">circle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">fórmula</string>
            <string language="en">formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polígonos</string>
            <string language="en">polygons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">unidades de superficie</string>
            <string language="en">units of area</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Fläche der flachen Abbildungen zu errechnen. 
Sie studiert die Maßeinheiten von Bereichen und leitet ab und 
verwendet die Formeln für die Berechnung der Bereiche von Vierecken, 
von Parallelogrammen, von Dreieck, von Rhombus, von Trapezium, von 
regelmäßigen Polygonen und von Kreis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de calculer la superficie des figures plates. Elle 
étudie les unités des zones et déduit et utilise les formules pour 
calculer les zones des rectangles, des parallélogrammes, de la 
triangle, du losange, du trapezium, des polygones réguliers et du 
cercle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações calcular a
área de superfície de figuras planas. Estuda as unidades das 
áreas e deduz e usa as fórmulas calculando as áreas de retângulos,
de paralelogramos, de triângulo, de rhombus, de trapésio, de 
polygons regulares e de círculo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
calcolare l'area delle figure piane. Studia le unità delle zone
e deduce ed usa le formule per la calcolazione delle zone dei 
rettangoli, dei parallelogrammi, del triangolo, del rhombus, del 
trapezium, dei poligoni normali e del cerchio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις για να υπολογίσει τον τομέα επιφάνειας του 
αεροπλάνου λογαριάζει. Μελετά τις μονάδες των περιοχών και 
συνάγει και χρησιμοποιεί τους τύπους για τον υπολογισμό των 
τομέων των ορθογωνίων, των παραλληλογράμμων, του τριγώνου, του 
ρόμβου, του τραπεζίου, των κανονικών πολυγώνων και του κύκλου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polygone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maßeinheiten des Bereiches</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cercle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">formule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polygones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unités de zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">área</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">círculo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fórmula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polygons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidades da área</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">zona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cerchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poligoni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità di zona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιοχή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύκλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τύπος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολύγωνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδες της περιοχής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
